text: I'm currently using singpath.com to practice on my python, but I face an issue with a problem:
A number, a, is a power of b if it is divisible by b and a/b is a power of b.
Write a function called is_power that takes parameters a and b and returns True if a is a power of b.

code:
def is_power(a,b):
    c = a/b
    if (((a%b) == 0) and ((c%b) == 0)):
        return True
    else:
        return False

text: Above is my solution but the system prompt me to generalize my solution.
Can anyone tell me whats wrong with my solution?
